DOC.brief_summary: INTRODUCTION : Hypothermia newborn cause morbid condition . In develop country basic technology neonatal adaptation may available . Polyethylene bag may alternative lamp radiant heat prevent hypothermia OBJECTIVE : To characterize difference baby undergo body bag polyethylene conventional drying neonatal adaptation Hospital de la Victoria Hospital de Engativá , Bogotá , Colombia , 2013 . MATERIALS AND METHODS : parallel-group randomized control trial . Groups : dry conventional ( control ) polyethylene body bag ( intervention ) . The procedure last 10 minute , bag body / radiant heat lamp remove . Environment temperature humidity , temperature body segment 1-5-10-60-120 minute APGAR measure . Statistical Analysis : Descriptive bivariate statistical inference calculate . Risk ratio ( RR ) confidence interval ( CIs ) determine use contingency table risk analysis outcome . The study approve hospital ethic committee victory .
DOC.brief_title: Polyethylene Body Bags Alternative Radiant Heat Lamp During Neonatal Adaptation Infants Older Than 29 Weeks
DOC.criteria: Inborn neonates gestational age > 29 week Abdominal wall defect , myelomeningocele , major congenital anomaly , blister skin disorder
